AboutPage.title: About GenX.art
AboutPage.description: GenX.art is an AI-powered art video creation platform that transforms your photos into stunning cinematic art in seconds.
AboutPage.introduction: GenX.art empowers creators to transform ordinary photos into extraordinary art videos. Using advanced AI technology, we make professional-quality video creation accessible to everyone. Our mission is to democratize creative expression—because every frame deserves to be art.

item-1.question: Do you offer a free trial?
item-1.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial.

item-2.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
item-2.answer: You can cancel your subscription by visiting the billing page.

item-3.question: Can I change my plan?
item-3.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time by visiting the billing page.

item-4.question: What is the refund policy?
item-4.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for monthly subscriptions (within 7 days of the monthly charge) and yearly subscriptions (within 7 days of the annual charge). Contact support@genx.art to request a refund.

item-5.question: Can't find what you're looking for?
item-5.answer: Please contact our customer support team at support@genx.art

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: GenX is really extraordinary and very practical, no need to break your head. A real gold mine.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: With no experience in webdesign I just redesigned my entire website in a few minutes with tailwindcss thanks to GenX.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: Great work on GenX template. This is one of the best personal website that I have seen so far :)

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: I downloaded the one of GenX template which is very clear to understand at the start and you could modify the codes/blocks to fit perfectly on your purpose of the page.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: GenX is redefining the standard of web design, with these blocks it provides an easy and efficient way for those who love beauty but may lack the time to implement it.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: I absolutely love GenX! The component blocks are beautifully designed and easy to use, which makes creating a great-looking website a breeze.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: GenX is the perfect fusion of simplicity and versatility, enabling us to create UIs that are as stunning as they are user-friendly.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: GenX has transformed the way I develop web applications. Their extensive collection of UI components, blocks, and templates has significantly accelerated my workflow.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: GenX is an elegant, clean, and responsive tailwind css components it's very helpful to start fast with your project.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love GenX ❤️. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: GenX templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: GenX is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!

HelpPage.noResults: No results found. Try a different search term.

q1.question: What is GenX.art?
q1.answer: GenX.art is an AI-powered platform that transforms your photos into stunning art videos. Simply upload a photo, choose from 5 unique art styles (Cyberpunk, Watercolor, Oil Painting, Anime, or Fluid Art), and get a beautiful video in about 30 seconds.

q2.question: Do I need any technical skills to use GenX?
q2.answer: Not at all! GenX is designed to be extremely user-friendly. If you can upload a photo and click a button, you can create art videos. No video editing, AI knowledge, or design skills required.

q3.question: What image formats are supported?
q3.answer: We support JPG and PNG image formats, with a maximum file size of 10MB. For best results, we recommend using high-resolution images with clear subjects.

q1.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
q1.answer: Most videos are generated in 15-45 seconds, depending on the style selected and current server load. You'll see a real-time progress indicator while your video is being created.

q2.question: What video resolution can I export?
q2.answer: Free users can download 720p videos. Pro subscribers get access to full 1080p HD quality without watermarks.

q3.question: Can I customize the art style parameters?
q3.answer: Currently, our styles are pre-tuned for optimal results. We're working on advanced customization options for Pro users in future updates.

q4.question: How many videos can I create?
q4.answer: Free users can create up to 3 videos per day. Pro subscribers enjoy unlimited video creation with priority processing.

q1.question: Is GenX free to use?
q1.answer: Yes! We offer a free tier that lets you create 3 videos per day with all art styles available. Videos are 720p with a small watermark. For unlimited creation and HD quality, check out our Pro plan.

q2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and PayPal through our secure payment processor, Stripe.

q3.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q3.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel your Pro subscription at any time from your account settings. You'll continue to have Pro access until the end of your billing period.

q1.question: How do I reset my password?
q1.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and enter your email. We'll send you a secure link to reset your password.

q2.question: Is my data safe?
q2.answer: Yes! We use industry-standard encryption and security practices. Your images are processed securely and we don't share your data with third parties. See our Privacy Policy for details.

q3.question: Can I delete my account?
q3.answer: Yes, you can request account deletion from your account settings. This will permanently delete all your data including created videos.

1.name: Sarah Chen
1.content: Finally don't need to learn After Effects! Upload a photo, get a video. My colleagues keep asking what software I use.

2.name: Mike Johnson
2.content: First time I felt like I could actually make artistic videos. So cool!

3.name: Emma Davis
3.content: Cut our product video costs by 80% and the results are even better.

4.name: Alex Kim
4.content: The anime style is incredible. My TikTok engagement went through the roof!

free.question: Is GenX free to use?
free.answer: Yes! Guests can create 3 videos per day for free. Registered users get more daily creates. Need more? Check out our Pro plan for unlimited access.

skills.question: Do I need technical skills?
skills.answer: Not at all! If you can upload a photo and click a button, you can use GenX. We've wrapped complex AI into a simple interface that anyone can use.

commercial.question: Can I use videos commercially?
commercial.answer: Free tier videos are for personal use only. Pro users get full commercial license for business projects, social media marketing, client work, and more.

watermark.question: Do videos have watermarks?
watermark.answer: Free tier videos include a small GenX watermark. Pro users can download completely watermark-free HD videos.

formats.question: What image formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support JPG and PNG formats, up to 10MB per image. Higher resolution original images give better results in your art videos.

time.question: How long does generation take?
time.answer: Usually 15-45 seconds, depending on video length and server load. You'll see real-time progress on screen while your video is being created.

data.question: Where is my data stored? (GDPR)
data.answer: Your data is stored on secure AWS servers in the US and EU. We're GDPR compliant—you can request data deletion anytime. See our Privacy Policy for details.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and PayPal via Stripe. All payments are secure and encrypted.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for Pro subscriptions: monthly plans are eligible within 7 days of the monthly charge, and yearly plans within 7 days of the annual charge. Simply contact support@genx.art within the guarantee period and we'll process your refund within 3 business days.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel anytime through your account dashboard or by contacting support@genx.art. Your access continues until the end of your billing period, and you won't be charged again.

seo.title: AI Video & Image Models - Compare and Choose | GenX
seo.description: Explore and compare the latest AI video and image generation models including Veo 3, Sora 2, Kling AI, Hailuo, Seedance, and Wan AI.

seo.title: Google Veo 3 AI Video Generator - Create Videos Online | GenX
seo.description: Try Google Veo 3, the most advanced AI video model with native audio generation. Create high-quality, cinematic videos with realistic sound effects and dialogue.

veo3.tagline: Google's most advanced AI video model with native audio generation
veo3.description: Veo 3 is a state-of-the-art AI video model from Google that generates high-quality videos with realistic, natural audio. Released at Google I/O 2025, it represents a significant improvement over its predecessor Veo 2 in quality, audio integration, and creative control.

audio.title: Native Audio Generation
audio.description: Create and integrate audio directly in generated videos, including sound effects, ambient sounds, and character dialogue with lip sync.

prompt.title: Advanced Prompt Understanding
prompt.description: Interpret complex, narrative prompts with high precision. Describe detailed scenes, character actions, and story elements in everyday language.

camera.title: Camera Control
camera.description: Specify camera movements such as pan, zoom, and angle changes. Create cinematic shots with dynamic perspectives and smooth transitions.

flf.title: First & Last Frame
flf.description: Generate seamless video content between two uploaded frames, ensuring smooth transitions and continuity for coherent storytelling.

viral.title: Viral Content Creation
viral.description: Create engaging viral videos in minutes. Make funny fake news clips, time-travel shorts, and talking animal videos with perfect audio-visual sync.

film.title: Filmmaking & Cinematics
film.description: Produce cinema-quality video with advanced camera controls, style references, and native audio. Perfect for short films and creative projects.

marketing.title: Marketing & Advertising
marketing.description: Generate professional marketing videos with consistent characters, precise style control, and high-quality audio for brand campaigns.

what.question: What is Google Veo 3?
what.answer: Veo 3 is Google DeepMind's latest AI video generation model that creates high-quality videos from text or image prompts, with enhanced character consistency, style and camera control, and native audio generation.

difference.question: How is Veo 3 different from Veo 2?
difference.answer: Unlike Veo 2, Veo 3 can generate native audio alongside video, delivers higher quality with realistic physics, better lip sync, and enhanced understanding of complex narrative prompts.

free.question: Can I use Veo 3 for free?
free.answer: Yes. You can try Google Veo 3 on GenX with free credits. Sign up to get started.

audio.question: Does Veo 3 support audio?
audio.answer: Yes. Veo 3 natively generates audio including sound effects, ambient sounds, and character dialogue with lip synchronization.

seo.title: OpenAI Sora 2 AI Video Generator - Create Cinematic Videos | GenX
seo.description: Try OpenAI Sora 2, the advanced AI video model with realistic physics, synchronized sound, and multi-shot narrative capabilities.

sora2.tagline: OpenAI's flagship video model with cinematic quality and realistic physics
sora2.description: Sora 2 is a major improvement over the original Sora, with significant advances in realism, physics accuracy, controllability, and style. It can follow physical laws and maintain consistent world states across multiple shots.

physics.title: Realistic Physics & World Knowledge
physics.description: Simulate real-world dynamics including gravity, buoyancy, object collisions, and other physical laws for highly realistic video generation.

audio.title: Synchronized Sound & Dialogue
audio.description: Generate rich audio scenes with speech, ambient sounds, and effects perfectly synced with visuals. Characters can speak naturally.

consistency.title: Long-term Consistency
consistency.description: Maintain object persistence and scene continuity across complex multi-shot sequences. Characters, props, and environments stay consistent.

cameo.title: Cameo: Real-World Integration
cameo.description: Upload video and voice samples to create personal cameo characters. Sora 2 learns your appearance and voice, then inserts you into any scene.

cinema.title: Cinematic Production
cinema.description: Create cinema-quality videos with precise physics modeling, multi-shot consistency, and realistic audio for professional film projects.

animation.title: Animation & Anime
animation.description: Generate stunning animations in realistic, cinematic, or anime styles with consistent characters and smooth motion throughout.

storytelling.title: Multi-shot Storytelling
storytelling.description: Build coherent stories across multiple shots with maintained world state, character consistency, and synchronized dialogue.

what.question: What is OpenAI Sora 2?
what.answer: Sora 2 is OpenAI's latest video and audio generation model, capable of producing highly realistic, physically accurate, and controllable videos in cinematic, anime, and realistic styles.

difference.question: How is Sora 2 different from the original Sora?
difference.answer: Sora 2 offers stronger physics simulation, more precise object persistence, multi-scene narrative capabilities, and synchronized sound, making it far more suitable for advanced creative projects.

free.question: Can I use Sora 2 for free?
free.answer: Yes. Sora 2 is available on GenX with free trial credits. Sign up to start creating.

professional.question: Can I use Sora 2 for professional projects?
professional.answer: Yes. Sora 2's precise physics modeling, multi-shot consistency, and realistic audio make it an excellent choice for filmmakers, animators, and content creators.

seo.title: Kling AI Video Generator - Create High-Quality Videos | GenX
seo.description: Try Kling AI, the advanced video generator by Kuaishou. Generate cinema-quality 1080p videos with lip sync, motion brush, and start/end frame support.

kling.tagline: Kuaishou's cinema-quality AI video generator with advanced features
kling.description: Kling AI is a cutting-edge video generation model by Kuaishou, capable of generating cinema-quality video clips from simple text prompts or images. It produces high-quality 1080p videos at 30fps with features like lip sync, motion brush, and start/end frame control.

cinematic.title: Cinema-Quality Output
cinematic.description: Generate 1080p video at 30fps with smooth frame rates and high-quality visuals from simple text prompts or uploaded images.

lipSync.title: Enhanced Lip Sync
lipSync.description: Upgraded lip sync with text-to-speech dubbing capabilities. Choose from realistic voices to perfectly match character personalities.

motionBrush.title: Motion Brush
motionBrush.description: Control the motion trajectory of specific objects in your videos. Paint motion paths for precise control over character and object movement.

startEndFrame.title: Start & End Frame
startEndFrame.description: Upload start and end frame images to generate smooth transitions between them, perfect for creating coherent visual sequences.

social.title: Social Media Content
social.description: Create engaging short videos for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts with high-quality AI video generation.

marketing.title: Marketing Videos
marketing.description: Produce professional marketing and advertising videos in 1080p for campaigns, product demos, and brand storytelling.

creative.title: Creative Projects
creative.description: Bring your creative visions to life with cinema-quality video, motion control, and lip sync for short films and art projects.

what.question: What is Kling AI?
what.answer: Kling AI is a cutting-edge video generation model by Kuaishou, with multiple versions including Kling 2, focused on generating cinema-quality 1080p videos at 30fps from text or image inputs.

free.question: Is Kling AI free to use?
free.answer: You can try Kling AI on GenX with free credits. Sign up with your email to start creating videos immediately.

types.question: What types of videos can Kling AI generate?
types.answer: Kling AI can generate many types of 1080p videos for marketing, film, social media, advertising, and more, with features like lip sync and motion brush.

speed.question: How fast does Kling AI generate videos?
speed.answer: Video generation typically takes about 60-70 seconds, depending on the video length and model variant chosen.

seo.title: Hailuo AI (MiniMax) Video Generator - Fast AI Videos | GenX
seo.description: Try MiniMax Hailuo AI, the ultra-fast AI video generator. Create high-quality videos from text or images in seconds with camera controls.

hailuo.tagline: MiniMax's ultra-fast AI video generator with camera controls
hailuo.description: Hailuo AI by MiniMax is a text-to-video generator that creates short video clips from written prompts. It can produce videos in under 30 seconds, supports both text-to-video and image-to-video modes, and offers camera control features.

speed.title: Ultra-Fast Generation
speed.description: Generate short video clips in under 30 seconds. The fast processing time lets you quickly iterate and create content.

i2v.title: Image-to-Video
i2v.description: Animate static images by adding effects and transitions to create visually appealing videos from your own photos or artwork.

t2v.title: Text-to-Video
t2v.description: Create high-quality videos from text prompts. Generate dynamic video content and engaging visuals that follow your instructions.

camera.title: Camera Controls
camera.description: Direct camera movements including zoom, pan, and tracking shots for more cinematic and professional-looking video output.

social.title: Social Media Content
social.description: Quickly generate eye-catching short videos for social media platforms. The fast generation time is ideal for content creators.

education.title: Educational Content
education.description: Create engaging educational videos and visual explanations from text descriptions for courses and tutorials.

marketing.title: Marketing & Ads
marketing.description: Produce marketing videos and ad creatives quickly, allowing rapid iteration and A/B testing of visual content.

what.question: What is MiniMax Hailuo AI?
what.answer: Hailuo AI is a text-to-video generator by MiniMax that creates short video clips from text prompts. It supports various applications including marketing, social media, and educational content.

how.question: How does Hailuo AI work?
how.answer: You input a detailed text prompt describing the video you want. The platform uses advanced AI algorithms to process the input and generate a video clip.

free.question: Is Hailuo AI free to use?
free.answer: Hailuo AI is available on GenX with free trial credits. Sign up to get started.

resolution.question: What formats and resolutions does Hailuo AI support?
resolution.answer: Hailuo AI generates videos in standard formats suitable for most social media and digital platforms, with support for multiple aspect ratios.

seo.title: Seedance AI Video Generator (ByteDance) - Create Stunning Videos | GenX
seo.description: Try Seedance by ByteDance, the AI video generator with precise semantic understanding, dynamic camera control, and multi-style support.

seedance.tagline: ByteDance's cinema-quality AI video generator with precise semantic understanding
seedance.description: Seedance is ByteDance's AI video generation model that produces cinema-quality visuals with precise semantic understanding, dynamic camera control, consistent multi-shot generation, and support for diverse visual styles from anime to pixel art.

semantic.title: Precise Semantic Understanding
semantic.description: Accurately interpret complex user prompts, understand semantic relationships, and execute temporally coordinated actions involving multiple subjects.

camera.title: Dynamic Camera Control
camera.description: Support dynamic and visually appealing camera movements including zoom, pan, and tracking for more cinematic video output.

multiShot.title: Consistent Multi-Shot Generation
multiShot.description: Generate videos with multiple shots from a single prompt, maintaining subject, style, and atmosphere consistency throughout.

styles.title: Multiple Visual Styles
styles.description: Support diverse artistic styles including black & white, 3D/2D animation, traditional Chinese painting, watercolor, pixel art, and more.

shortFilm.title: Short Film Production
shortFilm.description: Create cinema-quality short films with consistent multi-shot sequences, dynamic camera work, and various artistic styles.

social.title: Social Media Content
social.description: Generate engaging social media videos with precise prompt following and support for trending visual styles.

animation.title: Animation & Stylized Art
animation.description: Produce animations in diverse styles from anime and pixel art to traditional painting, with consistent style across frames.

what.question: How does Seedance work?
what.answer: Seedance uses DiT (Diffusion and Transformer) fusion units to generate videos, combining diffusion model characteristics with transformer architecture for better performance and higher quality output.

modes.question: Does Seedance support image-to-video?
modes.answer: Yes. Seedance can generate videos from both text and image prompts, giving you flexible input options for your creative projects.

multiCamera.question: Can Seedance handle multiple camera angles?
multiCamera.answer: Yes. Seedance features consistent multi-camera generation, allowing smooth transitions between different camera angles while maintaining subject consistency.

professional.question: Is Seedance suitable for professional video production?
professional.answer: Yes. Seedance delivers cinema-quality visuals and supports various professional video production needs, making it a powerful tool for filmmakers and content creators.

seo.title: Wan AI Video Generator (Alibaba) - Create Videos Online | GenX
seo.description: Try Wan AI by Alibaba, the open-source AI video model with 14B parameters. Generate stunning videos and images with 100+ visual styles.

wan.tagline: Alibaba's open-source AI model with 14B parameters and 100+ visual styles
wan.description: Wan AI is an open-source AI video generation model by Alibaba. It supports text and image inputs to generate stunning video and image content. With 14 billion parameters, it delivers precise and realistic visuals with accurate human poses and motion trajectories.

generation.title: Superior Generation Quality
generation.description: Powered by 14B parameters, deliver precise and realistic visuals with accurate human poses, motion trajectories, and multi-object interactions.

styles.title: 100+ Visual Styles
styles.description: Access over 100 visual style templates including cyberpunk, oil painting, and more. Customize character composition, expressions, and details.

multiObject.title: Multi-Object Interaction
multiObject.description: Generate realistic object interactions with the ability to distinguish motion trajectories of multiple objects across different scenes.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Wan AI is open-source, allowing researchers and developers to explore and build upon the model for custom applications.

creative.title: Creative Video Production
creative.description: Create promotional clips, tutorials, cinematic shorts, animations, and immersive 3D visuals with diverse visual styles.

social.title: Social Media Content
social.description: Generate dynamic and unique visual clips for social media with 100+ style templates to stand out from the crowd.

education.title: Educational Content
education.description: Produce engaging educational videos from text descriptions, with support for multiple visual styles and clear object interactions.

what.question: What is Wan AI?
what.answer: Wan AI is an open-source AI video generation model by Alibaba. Users can generate realistic video content by entering descriptive text prompts, with over 100 artistic style templates built in.

unique.question: What makes Wan AI unique?
unique.answer: Wan AI uses advanced VAE and DiT technologies to generate realistic, high-definition visual scenes. Its 14B parameters deliver exceptional quality and accuracy.

free.question: Is Wan AI free to use?
free.answer: Yes. You can try Wan AI on GenX with free credits.

speed.question: How fast is Wan AI?
speed.answer: Wan AI can generate 1080p videos up to 1 minute long in about 15 seconds, making it one of the fastest AI video generation solutions available.

what.question: What is OmniHuman 1.5?
what.answer: OmniHuman 1.5 is an AI model by ByteDance that generates realistic digital human videos from reference video and audio inputs, with natural lip sync and body movements.

how.question: How does OmniHuman work?
how.answer: Upload a reference video of a person and provide an audio file. OmniHuman generates a video of the person speaking with synchronized lip movements and natural gestures.

free.question: Is OmniHuman free to use?

languages.question: What languages does OmniHuman support?

seo.description: Try GPT Image 1.5 by OpenAI, the most advanced AI image generator with superior text rendering, image editing, and multi-style support.

gptImage.tagline: OpenAI's most advanced AI image generator with superior text rendering
gptImage.description: GPT Image 1.5 is OpenAI's latest image generation model that combines deep language understanding with stunning visual output. It excels at rendering text in images, complex scene composition, and precise prompt following across diverse artistic styles.

understanding.title: Deep Prompt Understanding
understanding.description: GPT Image 1.5 leverages GPT's advanced language capabilities to understand complex, nuanced prompts. It accurately interprets detailed descriptions, spatial relationships, and abstract concepts to produce exactly what you envision.

text.title: Superior Text Rendering
text.description: Unlike most AI image generators, GPT Image excels at rendering text within images. Create logos, posters, memes, and designs with clean, readable typography that matches your specifications.

editing.title: Intelligent Image Editing
editing.description: Beyond generation, GPT Image supports powerful image editing capabilities. Modify existing images with natural language instructions — change colors, add elements, adjust compositions, or transform styles.

styles.title: Versatile Style Range
styles.description: From photorealistic renders to watercolor paintings, flat illustrations to 3D artwork — GPT Image handles an incredibly wide range of visual styles with consistent quality and artistic coherence.

marketing.title: Marketing & Ads
marketing.description: Create eye-catching marketing visuals, social media graphics, and ad creatives with embedded text and brand-consistent imagery in seconds.

social.title: Social Media Content
social.description: Generate unique illustrations, memes, thumbnails, and profile graphics that stand out on any social platform.

design.title: Design Prototyping
design.description: Rapidly prototype UI mockups, product concepts, and visual designs with accurate text placement and layout control.

what.question: What is GPT Image 1.5?
what.answer: GPT Image 1.5 is OpenAI's latest AI image generation model. It combines GPT's language understanding with advanced image synthesis to create highly detailed, accurate images from text prompts.

difference.question: What's the difference between GPT Image 1.5 and 1.5 Lite?
difference.answer: GPT Image 1.5 offers the highest quality output with HD support and advanced text rendering. The Lite version is faster and more affordable, ideal for quick iterations and simpler images.

free.question: Is GPT Image free to use?
free.answer: Yes. You can try GPT Image on GenX with free credits.

text.question: Can GPT Image render text in images?
text.answer: Yes! GPT Image 1.5 is one of the best AI models for text rendering. It can create logos, posters, signs, and any image with clean, readable text.

resolution.title: 2048px Ultra Resolution

aesthetic.title: Superior Aesthetic Quality
aesthetic.description: Trained on carefully curated high-quality data, Seedream produces images with outstanding aesthetic appeal. Natural color harmony, balanced composition, and professional-grade visual quality in every output.

prompt.title: Advanced Prompt Following

what.question: What is Seedream 4.5?

difference.question: What's the difference between Seedream 4.5 and 4.0?

quality.answer: Seedream is trained on carefully curated, high-quality datasets and uses advanced diffusion techniques to produce images with exceptional detail, color accuracy, and aesthetic appeal.

nanobanana.tagline: Google Gemini-powered premium AI image generator

multimodal.title: Multimodal Intelligence
multimodal.description: Powered by Gemini 3 Pro's multimodal capabilities, Nanobanana Pro understands complex visual concepts, spatial relationships, and abstract ideas to generate images that precisely match your intent.

photorealism.title: Exceptional Photorealism
photorealism.description: Generate stunningly photorealistic images with natural lighting, accurate shadows, and lifelike textures. Ideal for product photography, portraits, and any application demanding visual authenticity.

reasoning.title: AI-Powered Reasoning
reasoning.description: Unlike simple diffusion models, Nanobanana Pro uses Gemini's reasoning capabilities to understand context, resolve ambiguities, and make intelligent creative decisions in image generation.

safety.title: Built-in Safety
safety.description: Google's advanced safety filters ensure generated images are appropriate and responsible. Content moderation is built into the model for reliable, safe image generation.

creative.title: Creative Projects

professional.title: Professional Imagery

what.question: What is Nanobanana Pro?

gemini.question: How is Nanobanana Pro related to Google Gemini?

bilingual.title: Native Bilingual Support

diversity.title: Rich Style Diversity

ratio.title: Flexible Aspect Ratios

efficiency.title: Fast & Efficient

what.question: What is Wan 2.5 Image?
what.answer: Wan 2.5 Image is Alibaba's text-to-image AI model from the Wan AI family. It specializes in fast, high-quality image generation with native bilingual support.

bilingual.question: Does Wan 2.5 support Chinese prompts?
bilingual.answer: Yes! Wan 2.5 Image natively supports both English and Chinese prompts. You can write in either language and get high-quality results without any translation needed.

free.question: Is Wan 2.5 Image free to use?
free.answer: Yes. You can try Wan 2.5 Image on GenX with free credits.

video.question: Is Wan 2.5 Image related to Wan AI video?
video.answer: Yes, both are part of Alibaba's Wan AI family. Wan 2.5 Image focuses on text-to-image generation, while Wan AI handles video generation. They share similar technology foundations.
